name: Dystopia
intro: A DEX on Polygon to use the ve(3,3) model
introduce: Dystopia is a decentralized exchange (DEX) designed to offer improved emissions and incentive mechanisms. The platform is the first DEX on Polygon to use the ve(3,3) model and provides users with a seamless swap experience for both closely correlated and non-correlated asset pairs at a nominal 0.05% trading fee.
